verses.text: \w These|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* words \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* covenant \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* commanded \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Moab, \w in|strong="H3478"\w* addition \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* covenant \w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* Horeb.\f + \fr 29:1 \ft That is, Mount Sinai, or possibly a mountain in the range containing Mount Sinai\f*

Moses summoned \w all|strong="H7200"\w* Israel \w and|strong="H1419"\w* proclaimed \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, “\w You|strong="H7200"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w with|strong="H5869"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* \w own|strong="H5869"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* everything \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H5869"\w* \w in|strong="H1419"\w* Egypt \w to|strong="H7200"\w* Pharaoh, \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* officials, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* land.

\w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H5869"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* great trials, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H8085"\w* miraculous signs \w and|strong="H3068"\w* wonders.

\w Yet|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w this|strong="H3212"\w* day \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H7272"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* given \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w mind|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* understand, eyes \w to|strong="H3212"\w* see, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* ears \w to|strong="H3212"\w* hear.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* forty years \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w led|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* wilderness, \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* clothes \w and|strong="H3068"\w* sandals \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* wear \w out|strong="H3045"\w*.

\w You|strong="H5221"\w* ate no bread \w and|strong="H4428"\w* drank no wine \w or|strong="H4428"\w* strong drink, \w so|strong="H3318"\w* \w that|strong="H4428"\w* \w you|strong="H5221"\w* \w might|strong="H4725"\w* know \w that|strong="H4428"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* am \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3318"\w* God.

When \w you|strong="H5414"\w* reached \w this|strong="H5414"\w* \w place|strong="H5414"\w*, Sihon king \w of|strong="H7626"\w* Heshbon \w and|strong="H3947"\w* Og king \w of|strong="H7626"\w* Bashan came \w out|strong="H5414"\w* against \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* battle, \w but|strong="H3947"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* defeated \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w We|strong="H6213"\w* took \w their|strong="H3605"\w* land \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w gave|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w an|strong="H6213"\w* inheritance \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Reubenites, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Gadites, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* half-tribe \w of|strong="H1697"\w* Manasseh.

\w So|strong="H6440"\w* keep \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w follow|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* words \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H6440"\w* covenant, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* prosper \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w All|strong="H5704"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w are|strong="H4325"\w* \w standing|strong="H6086"\w* today \w before|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H5704"\w* God—\w you|strong="H5704"\w* leaders \w of|strong="H4325"\w* tribes,\f + \fr 29:10 \ft LXX and Syriac; Hebrew you leaders, tribes\f* elders, officials, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w men|strong="H4264"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* Israel,

\w your|strong="H3068"\w* children \w and|strong="H3068"\w* wives, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* foreigners \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* camps \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* wood \w and|strong="H3068"\w* draw \w your|strong="H3068"\w* water—

\w so|strong="H4616"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* enter \w into|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w covenant|strong="H7650"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* God, \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* making \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w into|strong="H1961"\w* \w His|strong="H1961"\w* \w oath|strong="H7650"\w*,

\w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H1285"\w* establish \w you|strong="H3808"\w* today as \w His|strong="H3808"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H1285"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* as \w He|strong="H3808"\w* promised \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w and|strong="H1285"\w* as \w He|strong="H3808"\w* swore \w to|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* fathers, \w to|strong="H3808"\w* Abraham, Isaac, \w and|strong="H1285"\w* Jacob.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* making \w this|strong="H3588"\w* covenant \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* oath \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w only|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*,

\w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w also|strong="H1471"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w those|strong="H3427"\w* \w who|strong="H3427"\w* \w are|strong="H1471"\w* standing here \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w us|strong="H3045"\w* today \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w presence|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* God, \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w well|strong="H3045"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w those|strong="H3427"\w* \w who|strong="H3427"\w* \w are|strong="H1471"\w* \w not|strong="H3045"\w* here today.

\w For|strong="H6086"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w* yourselves know how \w we|strong="H3068"\w* lived \w in|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* land \w of|strong="H6086"\w* Egypt \w and|strong="H3701"\w* how \w we|strong="H3068"\w* passed \w through|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* nations \w on|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* way here.

\w You|strong="H3117"\w* saw \w the|strong="H5647"\w* abominations \w and|strong="H3068"\w* idols \w among|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w made|strong="H5647"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* wood \w and|strong="H3068"\w* stone, \w of|strong="H3068"\w* silver \w and|strong="H3068"\w* gold.

\w Make|strong="H8085"\w* sure \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w no|strong="H1961"\w* \w man|strong="H6771"\w* \w or|strong="H8085"\w* woman, clan \w or|strong="H8085"\w* tribe among \w you|strong="H3588"\w* today whose \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* turns \w away|strong="H3212"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H1288"\w* God \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* worship \w the|strong="H8085"\w* gods \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w those|strong="H8085"\w* nations. \w Make|strong="H8085"\w* sure \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w no|strong="H1961"\w* root among \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* bears \w such|strong="H2063"\w* poisonous \w and|strong="H3212"\w* bitter fruit,\f + \fr 29:18 \ft See Hebrews 12:15\f*

\w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w such|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w person|strong="H5545"\w* hears \w the|strong="H3605"\w* words \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* oath,\f + \fr 29:19 \ft Or curse\f* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* invokes \w a|strong="H3068"\w* blessing \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w himself|strong="H1931"\w*, saying, ‘\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* peace, \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w though|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* walk \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* stubbornness \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* own heart.’ \w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* bring disaster \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* watered \w land|strong="H8064"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* well \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* dry.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* never \w be|strong="H3068"\w* willing \w to|strong="H3478"\w* forgive \w him|strong="H3605"\w*. Instead, \w His|strong="H3605"\w* anger \w and|strong="H3478"\w* jealousy \w will|strong="H3068"\w* burn \w against|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H7451"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* curse \w written|strong="H3789"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w book|strong="H5612"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* fall \w upon|strong="H7451"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* blot \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* name \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w under|strong="H3605"\w* heaven

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* single \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H1755"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* tribes \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Israel \w for|strong="H3068"\w* disaster, according \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H1755"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* curses \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* covenant written \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* Book \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* Law.

\w Then|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* generation \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w*—\w your|strong="H3068"\w* sons \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w follow|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* foreigner \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w comes|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* distant land—\w will|strong="H3068"\w* see \w the|strong="H3605"\w* plagues \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sicknesses \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* inflicted \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5927"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* soil \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* burning waste \w of|strong="H3068"\w* sulfur \w and|strong="H3068"\w* salt, unsown \w and|strong="H3068"\w* unproductive, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H6213"\w* plant growing \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w just|strong="H3605"\w* \w like|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* destruction \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Sodom \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Gomorrah, Admah \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Zeboiim, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* overthrew \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w fierce|strong="H2750"\w* anger.

\w So|strong="H3318"\w* \w all|strong="H3772"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* nations \w will|strong="H3068"\w* ask, ‘\w Why|strong="H5921"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* done such \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thing \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* land? \w Why|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* great outburst \w of|strong="H3068"\w* anger?’

\w And|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w answer|strong="H3045"\w*, ‘\w It|strong="H3045"\w* \w is|strong="H3808"\w* because \w they|strong="H3808"\w* abandoned \w the|strong="H5647"\w* covenant \w of|strong="H5647"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H5647"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H5647"\w* \w their|strong="H5647"\w* fathers, which \w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w made|strong="H3045"\w* \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w them|strong="H5647"\w* \w when|strong="H3045"\w* \w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w brought|strong="H3212"\w* \w them|strong="H5647"\w* \w out|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H5647"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* land \w of|strong="H5647"\w* Egypt.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w went|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* served \w other|strong="H2088"\w* gods, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* worshiped gods \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* known—gods \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* given \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w anger|strong="H2534"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* burned \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* land, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w brought|strong="H3068"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H3117"\w* curse written \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* book.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* uprooted \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* land \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* anger, rage, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w great|strong="H6213"\w* wrath, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w He|strong="H5704"\w* \w cast|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w into|strong="H1540"\w* another land, where \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* today.’

The secret things belong to the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* our God, but the things revealed belong to us and to our children forever, so that \w we|strong="H3068"\w* may follow all the words of this law.
